data.text: @AM800News Our family came across the Ambassador bridge last night, all with negative RAT as required and were all still “randomly chosen” for the take home supervised PCR tests?? The test cost, nurse cost and pre-paid expedited shipping, what does 1 of these tests cost the tax payers?

@AM800News It was time 6 months ago for vaccinated cross border Canadians taking short trips. The science does not support the current requirements and our leaders are clueless. @jyduclos @marcomendicino @OmarAlghabra @Irek_K @JustinTrudeau @manvirshokar @CPHO_Canada @GovCanHealth
@AM800News The people who vote "NO" should be mandated to vote "YES"
